title: Around the AFC in 48 Minutes: 2022 Preview Edition
itunes:title: Around the AFC in 48 Minutes: 2022 Preview Edition
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Cynthia Frelund go around the entire AFC conference in 48 minutes. But first, the heroes hit the news: Brian Robinson Jr is in stable condition after being shot in robbery attempt (4:44), Geno Smith was named the starting quarterback for the Seahawks (6:11), and the Bills have released Matt Araiza amidst rape allegations (10:01). Then, the heroes go Around the AFC (14:50), starting with the AFC East (17:05), followed by the AFC North (29:49), next hitting the AFC South (45:25), and finally wrapping up with the ultra-competitive AFC West (58:31).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
